spec_data.Name: python2-fabulous
spec_data.Description:
fabulous is a python module for producing fabulously colored terminal output.

Run the demo to see what's available::

    $ python -m fabulous.demo
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:53:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Makes your terminal output totally fabulous
